text: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry recreate Princess Diana and Prince Charles ’ polo match kiss By Meaghan Wray Newlyweds Meghan Markle and Prince Harry shared a beautiful moment captured at the Sentebale Polo Match on Thursday ( July 26 ). It was reminiscent of a very similar display of affection between Princess Diana and Prince Charles back in 1987, when the late princess presented her former husband a prize at the Guards Polo Club in Windsor in Berkshire. Clearly, the prince is following in his mother's footsteps in more ways than one.
